name: Poopy Philosophy
description: Poopy philosophy - a philosophical approach to gaming. We play as a person on a toilet seat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 10 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 10 MB available space
